Posts.Content: Ahh Hun, Mine started yesterday and today was coming out a lot more, so I called up my mate, charged up the clippers and went a number 6 all over, felt a bit weird at first and I will probably hate it tomorrow  but right now i’m actually liking it and the kids like it too i only had my first chemo 2 weeks ago and they did say by the 3rd week it will be gone best of luck  Dawn xx
Posts.Title: Morning! Ah the shredding has begun.
